revised_title: The Structure and Function of Plant Cell Membranes and Envelope Systems
tldr: The article discusses the electron microscopy and composition of biological membranes and envelopes in plant cells. It explores the formation and dispersion of the nuclear envelope, the role of the endoplasmic reticulum in transport and organelle organization, and the relationship between the Golgi apparatus and the endoplasmic reticulum in membrane synthesis and transport of materials.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cell Biology
